name: Rogue In Hell
description: PLEASE NOTE: This game is at its earliest stages. You will most positively find a bug or two. I uploaded the game this early to get bug reports and feedback. This game is based off a Umedy course, but I've made major tweaks and completely different game mechanics that separates this game from the course. Please leave a comment if you encounter a bug or have a suggestion. The map is NOW playable since version 0.2. If you help me now, I can finish the game faster and make it the best it could be. Oh, and also, THE CHARACTER IS A MALE. This is my first game I've ever got as far as uploading.
